baby. If you 
go home the same day, a 
responsible adult should take 
you home in a car or taxi and 
stay with you for at least 24 
hours. Be near a telephone in 
case of an emergency.
Do not drive, operate machinery 
or do any potentially dangerous 
activities (this includes cooking) 
for at least 24 hours and not 
until you have fully recovered 
feeling, movement and co-
ordination. If you had a general 
anaesthetic or sedation, you 
should also not sign legal 
documents or drink alcohol for
